Name: Cat's Claw
Blessing of Vitality
Healing Light
Holy Nova
Desc: Basic attack.
Increases a target's maximum HP temporarily for the fight.
Restores a moderate amount of HP to a single ally.
Releases a burst of healing energy that restores HP to all allies.

Name: Guard Break
Stone Stance
Titan Terror
Warrior Warcry
Desc: Basic attack that deals damage and reduces enemy defense.
Enhance your defenses for a few turns, reducing damage taken.
Smash the ground, creating shockwaves that deal area damage to 4 enemies.
Boosts allies' attack power for a short duration.

Name: Ducky's Descent
Charming Quiver
Flicker Shot
Musical Note
Desc: Basic attack.
Enchants an arrow with hypnosis magic, turning the target into an ally for a limited time.
A rapid shot that creates illusions of multiple arrows, lowering target's damage.
Launch an arrow that resonates with hypnotic frequencies. Enemies are left vulnerable.

Name: Dragon's Touch
Blazing Wings
Rekindling Flame
Inferno
Desc: Basic attack.
Engulf an enemy in wings of flame, dealing damage over time.
Absorb incoming damage to heal yourself.
Exploding flames that deal area damage when they land on 2 enemies.

Name: Chrono Slash
Eternal Shield
Flash Forward
Seconds Minutes Hours
Desc: Basic attack.
Create a barrier for 2 rounds that absorbs damage and reflects a portion.
Dash through time to surprise attack, dealing double damage.
Execute a devastating strike that hits multiple enemies quickly.
